channel.title: Npc on npc?
channel.description: now if anyone have seen the swan song (i think thats what its called) in runescape, the wise old man fights the trolls, or in the khazarid battle field, gnomes attack the khazarid troops, now what im trying to say, make npcs fight each other like make it so like i dont know lets say npc id 1 attacks only npc id 6 and 7 can someone tell me how to do that?
